document.full_text: five political activists arrested in the united arab emirates this month are suspected of incitement to disobey the law and insulting the gulf country's leadership, the state news agency wam said on monday.
document.title: uae activists suspected of incitement and insults
lines_and_colors: five political activists arrested in the united arab emirates this month are suspected of incitement to disobey the law and insulting the gulf country's leadership, the state news agency wam said on monday.
